title: Panthers sale, offensive approach with Joe Person, Browns on Hard Knocks (Fooball 05/18)
description:
Joe Person of the Charlotte Observer joins Will Brinson to break down everything about the Panthers offseason, including the recent sale from Jerry Richardson to David Tepper, along with what it means for the coaching staff and front office. The guys dive into what they think the Panthers offense will look like with Norv Turner in 2018, how good the defense will be, whether the Panthers might be the worst team in the NFC South and if they can hit the over/under win total of 9, plus much more.
